languages.text: "Спорадические бунты нижних палуб никогда не докатываются до этих отсеков!" {n}- огрызается Теодора, от чего старый офицер, кажется, чуть приседает.{/n} "Нет, бузотерство швали всегда остается в пределах их собственных территорий. Тут слишком хорошая организация. Слишком эффективное продвижение..."

traits.locale_text: "Спорадические бунты нижних палуб никогда не докатываются до этих отсеков!" {n}- огрызается Теодора, от чего старый офицер, кажется, чуть приседает.{/n} "Нет, бузотерство швали всегда остается в пределах их собственных территорий. Тут слишком хорошая организация. Слишком эффективное продвижение..."

languages.text: "Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."
languages.original_text: "Спорадические бунты нижних палуб никогда не докатываются до этих отсеков!" {n}- огрызается Теодора, от чего старый офицер, кажется, чуть приседает.{/n} "Нет, бузотерство швали всегда остается в пределах их собственных территорий. Тут слишком хорошая организация. Слишком эффективное продвижение..."

traits.locale_text: "Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these chambers!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of mutants are always contained within their own territories. This is too well organised. Too efficient in how it is spreading..."

"Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these chambers!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of mutants are always contained within their own territories. This is too well organised. Too efficient in how it is spreading..."

"Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."

"Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."

"Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."

languages.text: “可下层甲板偶尔爆发的骚乱根本不会影响到这边！”{n}西奥多拉愤怒地开了口，总领稍稍退缩了一下。{/n}“不对，那群乌合之众的叛乱从来都没有蔓延到其他甲板。这次的袭击实在是太井井有条了，蔓延得实在是太快了……”
languages.original_text: "Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."

traits.locale_text: “可下层甲板偶尔爆发的骚乱根本不会影响到这边！”{n}西奥多拉愤怒地开了口，总领稍稍退缩了一下。{/n}“不对，那群乌合之众的叛乱从来都没有蔓延到其他甲板。这次的袭击实在是太井井有条了，蔓延得实在是太快了……”

languages.text: «¡Las rebeliones esporádicas en las cubiertas inferiores nunca llegan hasta estos compartimentos!». {n}La ira de Theodora hace que el Senescal se encoja ligeramente.{/n} «No, los tumultos del populacho siempre se limitan a su propio territorio. Esto está demasiado bien organizado. Se extiende demasiado rápido...».
languages.original_text: "Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Las rebeliones esporádicas en las cubiertas inferiores nunca llegan hasta estos compartimentos!». {n}La ira de Theodora hace que el Senescal se encoja ligeramente.{/n} «No, los tumultos del populacho siempre se limitan a su propio territorio. Esto está demasiado bien organizado. Se extiende demasiado rápido...».

languages.text: 「下層デッキの散発的な暴動がこれらのコンパートメントに到達することは決してありません！」{n}シオドーラの怒りを見て、家令長はわずかに身を縮める。{/n}「そうではありません。暴徒の騒ぎはいつも彼らの領域内に収まります。しかし、これはあまりにもよく組織されすぎて、あまりにも急速に広がりすぎています…」
languages.original_text: "Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."

traits.locale_text: 「下層デッキの散発的な暴動がこれらのコンパートメントに到達することは決してありません！」{n}テオドラの怒りにより、家令長はわずかに身を縮める。{/n}「そうではありません。暴徒の騒ぎはいつも彼らの領域内に収まります。これはあまりにもよく組織されすぎて、あまりにも急速に広がりすぎています…」
「下層デッキの散発的な暴動がこれらのコンパートメントに到達することは決してありません！」{n}シオドーラの怒りを見て、家令長はわずかに身を縮める。{/n}「そうではありません。暴徒の騒ぎはいつも彼らの領域内に収まります。しかし、これはあまりにもよく組織されすぎて、あまりにも急速に広がりすぎています…」

languages.text: « Les émeutes ponctuelles des ponts inférieurs n'atteignent jamais ces compartiments ! » {n}Face à la colère de Théodora, le sénéchal se recroqueville légèrement.{/n} « Non, en temps normal, les remous de la plèbe ne sortent pas du carcan de son territoire. Pour qu'ils se propagent aussi rapidement, le responsable doit avoir orchestré son coup avec soin. »
languages.original_text: "Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."

traits.locale_text: « Les émeutes ponctuelles des ponts inférieurs n'atteignent jamais ces compartiments ! » {n}Face à la colère de Théodora, le sénéchal se recroqueville légèrement.{/n} « Non, en temps normal, les remous de la plèbe ne sortent pas du carcan de son territoire. Pour qu'ils se propagent aussi rapidement, le responsable doit avoir orchestré son coup avec soin. »

languages.text: "Sporadische Unruhen auf den unteren Decks erreichen niemals diese Abteile!" {n}Theodoras Wut lässt den Truchsess leicht in sich zusammensinken.{/n} "Nein, Tumult im Pöbel wird immer innerhalb seines eigenen Territoriums eingedämmt. Das hier ist zu gut organisiert. Es breitet sich zu schnell aus ..."
languages.original_text: "Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."

traits.locale_text: "Sporadische Unruhen auf den unteren Decks erreichen niemals diese Abteile!" {n}Theodoras Wut lässt den Truchsess leicht in sich zusammensinken.{/n} "Nein, Tumult im Pöbel wird immer innerhalb seines eigenen Territoriums eingedämmt. Das hier ist zu gut organisiert. Es breitet sich zu schnell aus ..."

languages.text: "Alt güvertelerde arada bir çıkan isyanlar bu kompartımanlara hiç ulaşmaz!" {n}Theodora'nın öfkesi Seneşal'i hafiften sindiriyor.{/n} "Yok. Ayaktakımının çıkardığı kargaşalar, mıntıkalarının dışına taşmamıştır. Bunların iyi örgütlendikleri aşikâr. Yangın gibi de yayılıyor."
languages.original_text: "Sporadic riots on the lower decks never reach these compartments!" {n}Theodora's anger causes the Seneschal to shrink slightly.{/n} "No, the tumults of the rabble are always contained within their own territory. This is too well organised. It is spreading too rapidly..."
